name: Farmulous Demo Version
description:
This is a demo version of Farmulous!

Controls for web emulation:

PC Controls:


Up arrow key, w = Up D-PAD

Down arrow key, s = Down D-PAD

Left arrow key, a = Left D-PAD

Right arrow key, d = Right D-PAD

Alt, z, j = A Button

Ctrl, k, x = B Button

Enter = Start

Shift = Select

Mobile controls are already setted up.

Visit Alien Ship Attack!

There is a download link below.
